item.title: Neurosignalist
item.description: I’m a research scientist specializing in exploring the fundamental aspects of brain oscillations and their underlying cognitive processes. Pronouncing my name is easy - just say “eh” and then “sun” like you’ve suddenly spotted it in the sky!

item.title: Education
item.description: I earned my Ph.D., M.S.c., & B.Sc. in Biomedical Engineering from Ghent University (in 2022), Tehran University (in 2013), & Sahand University of Technology (in 2010 ), respectively.

item.title: PhD
item.description: My PhD research focused on developing a method to track the time course of EEG complexity, which we suggested reflects attentional engagement during listening to speech!
